Columns.Description: The user for which the error happened.
Columns.Name: UserName

Columns.Description: The activity type for which the error happened.
Columns.Name: ActivityType

Columns.Description: The error code for the error.
Columns.Name: Code

Columns.Description: The error code symbolic representation (if available).
Columns.Name: CodeSymbolic

Columns.Description: Indicator whether this is a service or customer error.
Columns.Name: ServiceError

Columns.Description: The name of the operation that failed.
Columns.Name: Operation

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
